# items

**Instance Property**

Returns the set of dynamic items you’ve added to the collision behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var items: [any UIDynamicItem] { get }
```

## Initializing and managing a collision behavior

- **addItem(_:)**: Adds a dynamic item to the collision behavior’s item array.
- **init(items:)**: Initializes a collision behavior with an array of dynamic items.
- **removeItem(_:)**: Removes a specific dynamic item from the collision behavior.

items.description: Adds a dynamic item to the collision behavior’s item array.
